short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), requires the supply and delivery of Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger at 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown, buildings J1, K8, K63, and K72 located in Oromocto, New Brunswick.
description: services publics et approvisionnement canada (spac), au nom du ministère de la défense nationale (mdn), a beauvoir de conclure un marché pour la fourniture et la livraison duéchangeurs de chaleur à tubes et à calandre à la base de soutien de la 5e division du canada gagetown (BS 5 Div C Gagetown), située à oromocto, bâtiments j1, k8, k63, and k72, au nouveau brunswick.
duration_in_months: The supply and delivery contract for Shell and Tube Heat Exchangers will run Maximum duration of :ALL MAXIMUM DURATION SPECIFIED IN THE RFP Document ",
